recipesJson.name: Sweet Cherry Churro
recipesJson.author: spicygal
recipesJson.description: Challenging finding a good free photo - anyway... looking here for chewy and cherry and sweet - so using angel cake to back up the churro and I love cherry crush - using the candy watermelon to back that up and add a sweetness plus super sweet cuz this one is supposed to be sweet hmm???!!!!  We'll see LOL
